Other Information.Additional Info: Enrichment achieved from complex mixtures (e.g., HRP:BSA at 1:500 mass ratio). Selectivity demonstrated with LOD of 0.1 fmol/μL.
Enrichment achieved from complex mixtures (e.g., β-casein:BSA at 1:500 mass ratio). Selectivity demonstrated with LOD of 0.1 fmol/μL.
Excluded due to size during enrichment experiments.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: LOD: 0.1 fmol/μL for both N-linked glycopeptides and phosphopeptides; Selectivity: 1:20 (glycopeptides) and 1:50 (phosphopeptides); Size-exclusion ability: 1:500.

Other Information.Additional Info: Core-shell structured magnetic MOF composite with dual functionalities: high hydrophilicity for glycopeptide enrichment and strong affinity for phosphopeptides. Exhibits excellent reusability (six cycles) and stability (two months). Applied successfully to human saliva samples for the enrichment of endogenous N-glycopeptides and phosphopeptides.
